verses.1: Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
verses.2: “Tu laitakin Pasianʼ tungah a phun lo, a heh loin ka om thei kei a, thum loin ka om thei kei hi.
verses.3: Amah ka zon dan ding thei-in, ama kiang ka tun nading zia a thei hi leng,
verses.4: a mai ah ka thu ka gen dinga, kei ka dikna thu a kicingin ka gen ding hi.
verses.5: Ama hong gen ding thute le kei a hong dawnna ding thute ka thei nuam hi.
verses.6: Pasian in a thaneih khempeuh tawh keima lang khat ah hong pang ding ahi hiam? Hong langpan lo dinga, ka thugen hong ngai ding hi.
verses.7: Kei a thuman ka hi a, Pasian kiangah ka gen ding hi. Kuama phel zawh nawn loh dingin keiʼ dikna a gen khia ding hi.
verses.8: “Ahi zongin Nisuahna lam ka zong a, Pasian ka mu kei hi. Nitumna lam ka zong a, amah ka mu thei tuan kei hi.
verses.9: Leilu lam ka zon hangin amah ka mu thei kei a, Leitaw lam ka zon hangin zong amah ka mu thei tuan kei hi.
verses.10: Ahi zongin Pasian in ka kalsuanna khempeuh thei a, kei hong ze-et leh ka sianthona a mu ding hi.
verses.11: Ama hong lamlahna citakin ka zui cinten a, lam ka pial ngei kei hi.
verses.12: Pasianʼ thupiakna bangin ka gamta ngitnget a, keima utna zui loin ama deihna ka zui hi.
verses.13: “Amah kikheel ngei lo a, kuamah in amah nial zo lo hi. Ama hih nopte kuamah in khaktan zo lo hi.
verses.14: Tua ahih manin kei adingin a geel sate tungsak ding hi. Amah in hih bangin geelna tampi tak a nei ahi hi.
verses.15: Tua hi a, ama omna ah kei ka lau mahmah a, ka ngaihsut khak ciangin amah ka kihta hi.
verses.16: Vanglian Pasian in ka lungsim hanna hong mangsak hi.
verses.17: Khuamial in ka mit a mialsak hangin keima kihtak pen khuamial hi lo a, Pasian ahi hi.
